definitions.definition: A covering flap in animals, such as a gill cover .
The lidlike portion of a moss sporangium or of a fruit that detaches to allow the dispersal of spores or seeds .
A gum flap covering (part of) a partially erupted tooth, usually a wisdom tooth .
A structure which serves as a cover or lid .
One of several flaps of cerebral cortex covering the insula. (clarification of this definition is needed)

main_definition: ( zoology ) A covering flap in animals, such as a gill cover .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) The lidlike portion of a moss sporangium or of a fruit that detaches to allow the dispersal of spores or seeds .
( dentistry ) A gum flap covering (part of) a partially erupted tooth, usually a wisdom tooth .
A structure which serves as a cover or lid .
( anatomy ) One of several flaps of cerebral cortex covering the insula. (clarification of this definition is needed)
